tech_questions.questionText: Which component is considered the 'brain' of the computer?
tech_questions.explanation: A CPU handles is the electronic circuitry that executes instructions

tech_questions.questionText: What is the memory limit of a 32-bit operating system?
What is the memory limit of a 64-bit operating system?
What do the F and G in FAANG stand for?
tech_questions.explanation: FAANG stands for: Facebook Apple Amazon Netflix Google

tech_questions.questionText: What is currently the largest counsumer hard disk drive?
tech_questions.explanation: Seagate offers consumer hard disk drives in 20 terabytes

tech_questions.questionText: What is currently the largest consumer solid state drive?
tech_questions.explanation: Teamgroup offers solid state drives with 15.3 terabytes

tech_questions.questionText: Who is the creator of the Linux kernel?
tech_questions.explanation: Linus Benedict Torvalds created the Unix based kernel in 1991

tech_questions.questionText: Who is considered as the father of computing?
tech_questions.explanation: Charles Babbage is considered to be the father of computing following his invention of the analytical engine in 1837

tech_questions.questionText: Which comapny was NOT founded by Elon Musk?
tech_questions.explanation: Twitter is a company that Elon PURCHASED in October of 2022

tech_questions.questionText: LinkedIn is owned by which major tech company?
tech_questions.explanation: In December of 2016, Microsoft acquired LinkedIn for $26.2 billion

tech_questions.questionText: Which web-browswer is NOT Chromium based?
tech_questions.explanation: Most browswers today except for Firefox are based on the open-source Chromium project. Firefox runs on their Quantum browswer-engine

tech_questions.questionText: What number base system do computers use?
tech_questions.explanation: Transistors only understand OFF & ON states, which the binary system represents with 0 & 1

tech_questions.questionText: What is the fourth layer in the TCP/IP model?
tech_questions.explanation: 1. Physical 2. Data-Link 3. Network 4. Transport 5. Application. RAM is not a layer

tech_questions.questionText: To increase the performance of an old computer, the first component to replace is the disk drive
tech_questions.explanation: The CPU and RAM have incredibly fast memroy and retrieve data from the slower memory found on secondary storage. If a PC is using a hard disk drive, the bottlenecks will be tremendous.

tech_questions.questionText: Which operating system is considered the lightest?
tech_questions.explanation: Due to its open-source nature and varierty of distributions, many Linux-based operating sytems are able to run efficiently on low-spec hardware

tech_questions.questionText: Which video conferencing is owned by Cisco?
tech_questions.explanation: Zoom is developed by Zoom Video Communications, Skype by Microsoft, and Meet by Google

tech_questions.questionText: Which social media platform is owned by a company outside the US?
tech_questions.explanation: TikTok was developed by ByteDance Ltd., which is a Chinese internet technology company headquartered in Beijing

tech_questions.questionText: Which big production company does NOT have its own streaming service?
tech_questions.explanation: Disney has Disney+ and 66% of Hulu, NBC has Peacock and 33% of Hulu, Paramount has Paramount+

tech_questions.questionText: Which company was among the first to launch smartwatches?
tech_questions.explanation: Along with Sony, Samsung released their first lineup of Galaxy Gear smartwaches back in 2013, at least 2 years before Apple Watch in 2015

tech_questions.questionText: How much was WhatsApp acquired for?
tech_questions.explanation: WhatsApp was acquired by Meta Platforms (formerly Facebook Inc) in Feburary 2014, for approximately $19.3 billion (exceeding Oculus and Instagram)
